name: BLT Avocado Toast 🥩
description: Here's a classic BLT with a twist of creamy avocado slices on top of crispy bacon and juicy tomatoes, all on a slice of crunchy toast.
instructions: Mash half of an avocado. Add salt and pepper, to taste. Mix until well combined.
Spread the mashed avocado evenly across toast, then top with tomatoes, lettuce, and bacon.
